adept.common

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.Document
        • adept.common.Conversation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Conversation
extends Document
    Represents a thread where the messages are successive chunks of text, including the authors who are participants in the thread.

    This class is locally immutable.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMessages

        public List<ConversationElement> getMessages()
        The messages in the thread.
        Returns:
        May be empty, but will not be or contain null. All must have a TokenStream. TODO should all have same TokenStream?

      • getParticipants

        public List<Entity> getParticipants()
        The particpants in the thread, including silent participants.
        Returns:
        May be empty, but will not be or contain null.
